Type.Name: CapStyle

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CapStyle extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Determines how the end of lines are drawn.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.CapStyle Butt = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The ends of the lines are drawn squared off and extending to the coordinates of the end point.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.CapStyle NotLast = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The same as Butt for lines of non-zero width. For zero width lines, the final point on the line will not be drawn.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.CapStyle Projecting = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The ends of the lines are drawn squared off and extending half the width of the line beyond the end point.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.CapStyle Round = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The ends of the lines are drawn as semicircles with the diameter equal to the line width and centered at the end point.
